item.title: Overview of the Ruijū Myōgishō
item.description: Overview of the Ruijū Myōgishō Ikeda Shōju Date published: 20 April 2025 This section provides an overview of the Ruijū Myōgishō, detailing its extant manuscripts, presumed compiler and provenance, scholarly significance, structural organization, textual sources, available facsimiles and indices, as well as pertinent
